title: Tech drops Sunday finale against Texas - Texas Tech Red Raiders - TexasTech.com
content:
1. Tech drops Sunday finale against Texas - Texas Tech Red Raiders  TexasTech.com
  2. Texas Tech takes two of three and the series against Texas  Viva The Matadors
  3. Texas Tech baseball falls to Texas in Big 12 series finale, drops first home contest  LubbockOnline.com
  4. No. 2 Baseball run-rules No. 16 Texas Tech 12-1  TexasSports.com
  5. Watch: Texas Tech’s Kurt Wilson Delivers Second Day of Walk-Off Heroics in Win Over Texas  Sports Illustrated
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: LUBBOCK, Texas – No. 16 Texas Tech fell 12-1 to No. 2 Texas in the series finale on Sunday at Rip Griffin Park. The contest ended with a run-rule after the seventh inning, soon-after Texas exploded for seven runs in the top half of the seventh. In league play, a 10-run, run-rule, is in effect on Sundays after seven innings are completed.
